description:
- - - Update, Summer 2015: This course offers the latest updates in safety tips - - -

Avoid delays and the costs associated with buying finished Roman Shades! This course unlocks your inner sewing skills to save you time and Money. Develop your confidence for choosing and measuring your own fabrics and transform them into stunning window treatments.

This beautifully animated 10 chapter course is packed with easy to follow instructions and includes handy icons and tool-tips to guide you through each phase. Every chapter begins with an indicator of expected time for each section - great if you want to fit it in between other tasks!

Master the art of planning and measuring before so you only buy the fabric you need. Apply backing fabric or blackout material and create hems and headers to finish your edges. Create pockets to conceal your ribs and ensure our blinds look great from inside as well as outside your windows. Attach rings in the right places and learn how to ensure safety with breakaway devices. Add nylon cord and velcro to attach your finished Roman Shade to your window and complete with a safety featured wall cleat.

Discover how you can save up to $500 per window. Enrol today and start saving and earning with the skills we teach you!

....................................................................................................

✪✪✪✪✪

"I would rate the Sewing easy Roman Shades Course 4.5 stars – it did exactly what it said and enabled me to make my blinds."

....................................................................................................

Over 3,000 people worldwide have already bought our eBook and started saving. Now we're offering this full video course based on the success of our techniques...

Get Creating Today & Say goodbye to delays & unfinished windows – hello to easy window treatments. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed - Purchase risk-free from Udemy with a 30-day refund available, so you can enrol now with confidence.

Still not convinced? We offer a FREE preview of one of the lectures so you can experience some of the content!

Hurry now today's low price only lasts until Autumn when it goes back up to to $99...
title: DIY Roman Shades – All Levels Sewing Course
